AcceptAdministratorInvitation.name: AcceptAdministratorInvitation
AcceptAdministratorInvitation.description: Grants permission to accept Security Hub invitations to become a member account

AcceptInvitation.name: AcceptInvitation
AcceptInvitation.description: Grants permission to accept Security Hub invitations to become a member account

BatchDeleteAutomationRules.name: BatchDeleteAutomationRules
BatchDeleteAutomationRules.description: Grants permission to delete one or more automation rules in Security Hub

BatchDisableStandards.name: BatchDisableStandards
BatchDisableStandards.description: Grants permission to disable standards in Security Hub

BatchEnableStandards.name: BatchEnableStandards
BatchEnableStandards.description: Grants permission to enable standards in Security Hub

BatchGetAutomationRules.name: BatchGetAutomationRules
BatchGetAutomationRules.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of details for automation rules from Security Hub based on rule Amazon Resource Names (ARNs)

BatchGetConfigurationPolicyAssociations.name: BatchGetConfigurationPolicyAssociations
BatchGetConfigurationPolicyAssociations.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about configuration policies associated with a specific list of member accounts and organizational units of the calling account's organization

BatchGetControlEvaluations.name: BatchGetControlEvaluations
BatchGetControlEvaluations.description: Grants permission to get the enablement and compliance status of controls, the findings count for controls, and the overall security score for controls on the Security Hub console

BatchGetSecurityControls.name: BatchGetSecurityControls
BatchGetSecurityControls.description: Grants permission to get details about specific security controls identified by ID or ARN

BatchGetStandardsControlAssociations.name: BatchGetStandardsControlAssociations
BatchGetStandardsControlAssociations.description: Grants permission to get the enablement status of a batch of security controls in standards

BatchImportFindings.name: BatchImportFindings
BatchImportFindings.description: Grants permission to import findings into Security Hub from an integrated product

BatchUpdateAutomationRules.name: BatchUpdateAutomationRules
BatchUpdateAutomationRules.description: Grants permission to update one or more automation rules from Security Hub based on rule Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) and input parameters

BatchUpdateFindings.name: BatchUpdateFindings
BatchUpdateFindings.description: Grants permission to update customer-controlled fields for a selected set of Security Hub findings

BatchUpdateStandardsControlAssociations.name: BatchUpdateStandardsControlAssociations
BatchUpdateStandardsControlAssociations.description: Grants permission to update the enablement status of a batch of security controls in standards

CreateActionTarget.name: CreateActionTarget
CreateActionTarget.description: Grants permission to create custom actions in Security Hub

CreateAutomationRule.name: CreateAutomationRule
CreateAutomationRule.description: Grants permission to create an automation rule based on input parameters

CreateConfigurationPolicy.name: CreateConfigurationPolicy
CreateConfigurationPolicy.description: Grants permission to create a configuration policy to manage organization member settings in Security Hub

CreateFindingAggregator.name: CreateFindingAggregator
CreateFindingAggregator.description: Grants permission to create a finding aggregator, which contains the cross-Region finding aggregation configuration

CreateInsight.name: CreateInsight
CreateInsight.description: Grants permission to create insights in Security Hub. Insights are collections of related findings

CreateMembers.name: CreateMembers
CreateMembers.description: Grants permission to create member accounts in Security Hub

DeclineInvitations.name: DeclineInvitations
DeclineInvitations.description: Grants permission to decline Security Hub invitations to become a member account

DeleteActionTarget.name: DeleteActionTarget
DeleteActionTarget.description: Grants permission to delete custom actions in Security Hub

DeleteConfigurationPolicy.name: DeleteConfigurationPolicy
DeleteConfigurationPolicy.description: Grants permission to delete an existing configuration policy

DeleteFindingAggregator.name: DeleteFindingAggregator
DeleteFindingAggregator.description: Grants permission to delete a finding aggregator, which disables finding aggregation across Regions

DeleteInsight.name: DeleteInsight
DeleteInsight.description: Grants permission to delete insights from Security Hub

DeleteInvitations.name: DeleteInvitations
DeleteInvitations.description: Grants permission to delete Security Hub invitations to become a member account

DeleteMembers.name: DeleteMembers
DeleteMembers.description: Grants permission to delete Security Hub member accounts

DescribeActionTargets.name: DescribeActionTargets
DescribeActionTargets.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of custom actions using the API

DescribeHub.name: DescribeHub
DescribeHub.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the hub resource in your account

DescribeOrganizationConfiguration.name: DescribeOrganizationConfiguration
DescribeOrganizationConfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe the organization configuration for Security Hub

DescribeProducts.name: DescribeProducts
DescribeProducts.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the available Security Hub product integrations

DescribeStandards.name: DescribeStandards
DescribeStandards.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about Security Hub standards

DescribeStandardsControls.name: DescribeStandardsControls
DescribeStandardsControls.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about Security Hub standards controls

DisableImportFindingsForProduct.name: DisableImportFindingsForProduct
DisableImportFindingsForProduct.description: Grants permission to disable the findings importing for a Security Hub integrated product

DisableOrganizationAdminAccount.name: DisableOrganizationAdminAccount
DisableOrganizationAdminAccount.description: Grants permission to remove the Security Hub administrator account for your organization

DisableSecurityHub.name: DisableSecurityHub
DisableSecurityHub.description: Grants permission to disable Security Hub

DisassociateFromAdministratorAccount.name: DisassociateFromAdministratorAccount
DisassociateFromAdministratorAccount.description: Grants permission to a Security Hub member account to disassociate from the associated administrator account

DisassociateFromMasterAccount.name: DisassociateFromMasterAccount
DisassociateFromMasterAccount.description: Grants permission to a Security Hub member account to disassociate from the associated master account

DisassociateMembers.name: DisassociateMembers
DisassociateMembers.description: Grants permission to disassociate Security Hub member accounts from the associated administrator account

EnableImportFindingsForProduct.name: EnableImportFindingsForProduct
EnableImportFindingsForProduct.description: Grants permission to enable the findings importing for a Security Hub integrated product

EnableOrganizationAdminAccount.name: EnableOrganizationAdminAccount
EnableOrganizationAdminAccount.description: Grants permission to designate a Security Hub administrator account for your organization

EnableSecurityHub.name: EnableSecurityHub
EnableSecurityHub.description: Grants permission to enable Security Hub

GetAdhocInsightResults.name: GetAdhocInsightResults
GetAdhocInsightResults.description: Grants permission to retrieve insight results by providing a set of filters instead of an insight ARN

GetAdministratorAccount.name: GetAdministratorAccount
GetAdministratorAccount.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about the Security Hub administrator account

GetConfigurationPolicy.name: GetConfigurationPolicy
GetConfigurationPolicy.description: Grants permission to get a complete overview of one configuration policy created by the calling account

GetConfigurationPolicyAssociation.name: GetConfigurationPolicyAssociation
GetConfigurationPolicyAssociation.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a configuration policy associated with a member account or organizational unit of the calling account's organization

GetControlFindingSummary.name: GetControlFindingSummary
GetControlFindingSummary.description: Grants permission to retrieve a security score and counts of finding and control statuses for a security standard

GetEnabledStandards.name: GetEnabledStandards
GetEnabledStandards.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of the standards that are enabled in Security Hub

GetFindingAggregator.name: GetFindingAggregator
GetFindingAggregator.description: Grants permission to retrieve details for a finding aggregator, which configures finding aggregation across Regions

GetFindingHistory.name: GetFindingHistory
GetFindingHistory.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of finding history from Security Hub

GetFindings.name: GetFindings
GetFindings.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of findings from Security Hub

GetFreeTrialEndDate.name: GetFreeTrialEndDate
GetFreeTrialEndDate.description: Grants permission to retrieve the end date for an account's free trial of Security Hub

GetFreeTrialUsage.name: GetFreeTrialUsage
GetFreeTrialUsage.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about Security Hub usage during the free trial period

GetInsightFindingTrend.name: GetInsightFindingTrend
GetInsightFindingTrend.description: Grants permission to retrieve an insight finding trend from Security Hub in order to generate a graph

GetInsightResults.name: GetInsightResults
GetInsightResults.description: Grants permission to retrieve insight results from Security Hub

GetInsights.name: GetInsights
GetInsights.description: Grants permission to retrieve Security Hub insights

GetInvitationsCount.name: GetInvitationsCount
GetInvitationsCount.description: Grants permission to retrieve the count of Security Hub membership invitations sent to the account

GetMasterAccount.name: GetMasterAccount
GetMasterAccount.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about the Security Hub master account

GetMembers.name: GetMembers
GetMembers.description: Grants permission to retrieve the details of Security Hub member accounts

GetSecurityControlDefinition.name: GetSecurityControlDefinition
GetSecurityControlDefinition.description: Grants permission to get the definition details of a specific security control identified by ID

GetUsage.name: GetUsage
GetUsage.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about Security Hub usage by accounts

InviteMembers.name: InviteMembers
InviteMembers.description: Grants permission to invite other AWS accounts to become Security Hub member accounts

ListAutomationRules.name: ListAutomationRules
ListAutomationRules.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of automation rules and their metadata for the calling account from Security Hub

ListConfigurationPolicies.name: ListConfigurationPolicies
ListConfigurationPolicies.description: Grants permission to list the summaries of all configuration policies created by the calling account

ListConfigurationPolicyAssociations.name: ListConfigurationPolicyAssociations
ListConfigurationPolicyAssociations.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all configuration policies associationed with all member accounts and organizational units of the calling account's organization

ListControlEvaluationSummaries.name: ListControlEvaluationSummaries
ListControlEvaluationSummaries.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of controls for a standard, including the control IDs, statuses and finding counts

ListEnabledProductsForImport.name: ListEnabledProductsForImport
ListEnabledProductsForImport.description: Grants permission to retrieve the Security Hub integrated products that are currently enabled

ListFindingAggregators.name: ListFindingAggregators
ListFindingAggregators.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of finding aggregators, which contain the cross-Region finding aggregation configuration

ListInvitations.name: ListInvitations
ListInvitations.description: Grants permission to retrieve the Security Hub invitations sent to the account

ListMembers.name: ListMembers
ListMembers.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about Security Hub member accounts associated with the administrator account

ListOrganizationAdminAccounts.name: ListOrganizationAdminAccounts
ListOrganizationAdminAccounts.description: Grants permission to list the Security Hub administrator accounts for your organization

ListSecurityControlDefinitions.name: ListSecurityControlDefinitions
ListSecurityControlDefinitions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of security control definitions, which contain details for security controls in the current region

ListStandardsControlAssociations.name: ListStandardsControlAssociations
ListStandardsControlAssociations.description: Grants permission to list the enablement status of a security control in standards

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list of tags associated with a resource

SendFindingEvents.name: SendFindingEvents
SendFindingEvents.description: Grants permission to use a custom action to send Security Hub findings to Amazon EventBridge

SendInsightEvents.name: SendInsightEvents
SendInsightEvents.description: Grants permission to use a custom action to send Security Hub insights to Amazon EventBridge

StartConfigurationPolicyAssociation.name: StartConfigurationPolicyAssociation
StartConfigurationPolicyAssociation.description: Grants permission to associate a configuration policy with a member account or organizational unit in the calling account's organization

StartConfigurationPolicyDisassociation.name: StartConfigurationPolicyDisassociation
StartConfigurationPolicyDisassociation.description: Grants permission to remove a configuration policy association from a member account or organizational unit in the calling account's organization

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to a Security Hub resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a Security Hub resource

UpdateActionTarget.name: UpdateActionTarget
UpdateActionTarget.description: Grants permission to update custom actions in Security Hub

UpdateConfigurationPolicy.name: UpdateConfigurationPolicy
UpdateConfigurationPolicy.description: Grants permission to update an existing configuration policy

UpdateFindingAggregator.name: UpdateFindingAggregator
UpdateFindingAggregator.description: Grants permission to update a finding aggregator, which contains the cross-Region finding aggregation configuration

UpdateFindings.name: UpdateFindings
UpdateFindings.description: Grants permission to update Security Hub findings

UpdateInsight.name: UpdateInsight
UpdateInsight.description: Grants permission to update insights in Security Hub

UpdateOrganizationConfiguration.name: UpdateOrganizationConfiguration
UpdateOrganizationConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update the organization configuration for Security Hub

UpdateSecurityControl.name: UpdateSecurityControl
UpdateSecurityControl.description: Grants permission to update properties of a specific security control identified by ID or ARN

UpdateSecurityHubConfiguration.name: UpdateSecurityHubConfiguration
UpdateSecurityHubConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update Security Hub configuration

UpdateStandardsControl.name: UpdateStandardsControl
UpdateStandardsControl.description: Grants permission to update Security Hub standards controls
